ModMetaData.name: Call of Duty: Zombies Pack
ModMetaData.author: Robotrowful
ModMetaData.description:
Addes new Weapons, Buildings and Researches based on call of duty zombies +4 Research Tasks +4 Buildings +68 New Weapons +6 Perk A Colas
Compatibility: Royalty DLC Achievements Persona Bond Forge JecsTools / Enable Oversized Weapons
